name: Girls or Boys in Cages
description:
Version 1.1

Girls or Boys in Cages is an electronic board video game of chance. Be the player to free the most girls or boys and win the game. Human players can rotate the dice before rolling them to alter chance. Dice actually are rolled to determine random number.

Choose which gender will be put in the cages, girls or boys. Then advance around the board opening cages to get the most girls, or boys.

Two player game with five different game modes. Play against your friends or enemies. Game can be played with two people, person and computer or set for all computers to watch.

Do not let the simplicity fool you, this game is a challenge and fun.

Controls: left arrow and right arrow to rotate dice before rolling. Left ctrl to roll dice.

Free of charge, this game has no cost to get a copy, and can be distributed. Win32 is also hosted on amazon.com, that version has an installer.

Windows 32 bit, and Windows 64 bit. Linux 32bit and Linux 64bit.
Usage of keyboard and mouse

Girl Boy girl boy board game video indie dice chance gambling gamble fun computer windows software casual puzzle Linux Linux mint
